verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H0859"\w* deep wounds \w for|strong="H3117"\w* grief; \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wall round \w us|strong="H3117"\w*: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* judge \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* blow \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* face \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* rod.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, Beth-lehem Ephrathah, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* least \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Judah, \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* ruler \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w going|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* been purposed \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* past, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* eternal days.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* \w cause|strong="H0657"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* child \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given birth: \w then|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rest \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brothers \w will|strong="H3068"\w* come back \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* children \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Israel.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* food \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* flock \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* glory \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w his|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* resting-place \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w safe|strong="H7965"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* great \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* peace: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrian \w comes|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* feet \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w then|strong="H0853"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w against|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* seven keepers \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* flocks \w and|strong="H0935"\w* eight chiefs \w among|strong="H0776"\w* men.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* make \w waste|strong="H3176"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assyria \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nimrod \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* edge \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sword: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* salvation \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrian \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* country, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w inside|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* limit \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w rest|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* mass \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* dew \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* showers \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* grass, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* kept back \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sons \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* middle \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mass \w of|strong="H3027"\w* peoples, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* woods, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* young lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flocks \w of|strong="H3027"\w* sheep: if \w he|strong="H5921"\w* goes \w through|strong="H3027"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* crushed \w under|strong="H5921"\w* foot \w and|strong="H3027"\w* pulled \w to|strong="H5921"\w* bits, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* saviour.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3068"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H1961"\w* against \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* against \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* haters \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* come \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* day, says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* take \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* horses \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* give \w your|strong="H3605"\w* war-carriages \w to|strong="H0776"\w* destruction:

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* towns \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* land \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* all \w your|strong="H3808"\w* strong places pulled \w down|strong="H3772"\w*:

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w an|strong="H3772"\w* end \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* use \w of|strong="H3027"\w* secret arts, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* readers \w of|strong="H3027"\w* signs:

\w And|strong="H0842"\w* I will have \w your|strong="H7130"\w* images \w and|strong="H0842"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* pillars cut off \w from|strong="H0842"\w* \w you|strong="H7130"\w*; \w and|strong="H0842"\w* \w you|strong="H7130"\w* will no longer give worship to \w the|strong="H7130"\w* work \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* hands.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* Asherahs pulled up \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* send destruction \w on|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* images.
And my punishment will be effected on the nations with such burning wrath as they have not had word of.
